events.message: I received my order last week but I want to return it and get a refund because the product did not meet my expectations.
The request involves a refund for an order return, categorizing the issue under Refund.
Assigning customer support agent to handle the refund and return request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your refund request. Iâ€™m here to assist you with the return process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the product for a full refund?
My order number is 123456789 and the item did not work as described, so I would like to return it and get my money back.
We have processed your return request. Please ship the product back using the prepaid label we will email you, and your refund will be issued within 5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the product back as soon as possible.
We have confirmed the product return and your refund has been processed. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and are satisfied with how your case was handled.
Yes, I have received the refund successfully. Thank you for your assistance throughout the process.
Closing the case now as the customer has confirmed refund receipt and expressed satisfaction with the resolution.
